item.title: DNS Architecture & Management
item.description: A comprehensive guide to the Domain Name System, recursion, caching, and overriding resolvers on Linux/Windows.

item.description: Understanding Container Orchestration, Control Plane architecture, Pods, Services, and kubectl mastery.

item.description: The fundamental principles of building scalable, reliable, and maintainable distributed systems.

item.description: A deep dive into Pointers, Memory Management, System Calls, and the compilation process on Linux.

item.description: A comprehensive analysis of Hugo, Astro, Quartz, Next.js, and more. Which one fits your engineering needs?
